segment.source: Configure MDT settings (Windows 10)
segment.target: Configure MDT settings (Windows 10)

segment.source: One of the most powerful features in Microsoft Deployment Toolkit (MDT) 2013 is its extension capabilities; there is virtually no limitation to what you can do in terms of customization.
segment.target: One of the most powerful features in Microsoft Deployment Toolkit (MDT) 2013 is its extension capabilities; there is virtually no limitation to what you can do in terms of customization.

segment.source: Configure MDT settings
segment.target: Configure MDT settings

segment.source: One of the most powerful features in Microsoft Deployment Toolkit (MDT) 2013 is its extension capabilities; there is virtually no limitation to what you can do in terms of customization.
segment.target: One of the most powerful features in Microsoft Deployment Toolkit (MDT) 2013 is its extension capabilities; there is virtually no limitation to what you can do in terms of customization.

segment.source: In this topic, you learn about configuring customizations for your environment.
segment.target: In this topic, you learn about configuring customizations for your environment.

segment.source: For the purposes of this topic, we will use four machines: DC01, MDT01, HV01, and PC0001.
segment.target: For the purposes of this topic, we will use four machines: DC01, MDT01, HV01, and PC0001.

segment.source: DC01 is a domain controller, MDT01 is a Windows Server 2012 R2 Standard server, and PC0001 is a Windows 10 Enterprise x64 client used for the MDT simulation environment.
segment.target: DC01 is a domain controller, MDT01 is a Windows Server 2012 R2 Standard server, and PC0001 is a Windows 10 Enterprise x64 client used for the MDT simulation environment.

segment.source: OR01 has Microsoft System Center 2012 R2 Orchestrator installed.
segment.target: OR01 has Microsoft System Center 2012 R2 Orchestrator installed.

segment.source: MDT01, OR01, and PC0001 are members of the domain contoso.com for the fictitious Contoso Corporation.
segment.target: MDT01, OR01, and PC0001 are members of the domain contoso.com for the fictitious Contoso Corporation.

segment.source: For more details on the setup for this topic, please see Deploy Windows 10 with the Microsoft Deployment Toolkit.
segment.target: For more details on the setup for this topic, please see Deploy Windows 10 with the Microsoft Deployment Toolkit.

segment.target: figure 1

segment.target: The machines used in this topic.
